docs.snippet: Jason Pierre-Paul, who had surgery to repair a herniated disk in the off-season, said the continual pain he had felt was gone. His status for the season opener, however, remained uncertain....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jason Pierre-Paul, who had surgery to repair a herniated disk in the off-season, said the continual pain he had felt was gone. His status for the season opener, however, remained uncertain.
docs.abstract: New York Giants defensive end Jason Pierre-Paul, who had surgery to repair a herniated disk in the off-season, says continual back pain he had is gone but he is taking a cautious approach.

headline.main: Pierre-Paul, Free of Back Pain, Is Taking a Cautious Approach
headline.print_headline: Pierre-Paul, Free of Back Pain, Is Taking a Cautious Approach
